content.question: In the third sentence of the third paragraph, the phrase “however volatile” primarily serves to

choices.label: demonstrate wit by developing a metaphor introduced earlier in the passage
identify one of the weaknesses typically exhibited by imaginative minds
qualify a generalization by narrowing the set of people to which it applies
strengthen a claim by indicating that it applies even to exceptional cases

content.answer: strengthen a claim by indicating that it applies even to exceptional cases

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how writers create, combine, and place independent and dependent clauses to show relationships between and among ideas.
